about_the_game:
With this RPG Stories Demo, you can test our massive 3D World-Builder by further building three Demo Scenes we prepared for you; One High Fantasy, one Modern Horror, and one Sci-Fi.

You cannot connect to an online session unless an owner of a GM Version with our upcoming DLC “Unlock Player Seats” invites you.
You may upgrade to the Player Version or the GM Version anytime you want.
The Player Version will allow you to join any online session, hosted by anyone and the GM Version will unlock all our 3D models and features of the world-builder and will also allow you to host games as the Game Master.
detailed_description:
With this RPG Stories Demo, you can test our massive 3D World-Builder by further building three Demo Scenes we prepared for you; One High Fantasy, one Modern Horror, and one Sci-Fi.

You cannot connect to an online session unless an owner of a GM Version with our upcoming DLC “Unlock Player Seats” invites you.
You may upgrade to the Player Version or the GM Version anytime you want.
The Player Version will allow you to join any online session, hosted by anyone and the GM Version will unlock all our 3D models and features of the world-builder and will also allow you to host games as the Game Master.
name: RPG Stories Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This demo allows you to test our 3D World-Builder and also connect to games hosted by Game Masters who own the “Unlock Player Seats” DLC.
